content: Design and optimize dynamic frontend interfaces for web applications, ensuring smooth user interaction and efficient data rendering.
Build and deploy Progressive Web Applications (PWAs) using modern frontend frameworks like Vue and React, delivering fast, responsive experiences across devices.
Integrate third-party APIs and cloud-based services to enrich frontend functionality, improve performance, and enable real-time features.
Collaborate with designers, QA, and backend developers to implement scalable, secure, and visually engaging user interfaces aligned with business goals.
